verses.verse: Rejoice <S%H8055><s%> <S%H408>not,<s%> O <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H413>for<s%> <S%H1524>joy,<s%> as other <S%H5971>people:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> thou hast gone a <S%H2181>whoring<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H5921><s%> thy <S%H430>God,<s%> thou hast <S%H157>loved<s%> a <S%H868>reward<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H1715>corn<s%> <S%H1637>floor.<s%>
The <S%H1637>floor<s%> and the <S%H3342>winepress<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7462>feed<s%> them, and the new <S%H8492>wine<s%> shall <S%H3584>fail<s%> in her.

They shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H3068>LORD's<s%> <S%H776>land;<s%> but <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> shall <S%H7725>return<s%> to <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and they shall <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H2931>unclean<s%> things in <S%H804>Assyria.<s%>

They shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5258>offer<s%> <S%H3196>wine<s%> offerings to the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall they be <S%H6149>pleasing<s%> unto him: their <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> shall be unto them as the <S%H3899>bread<s%> of <S%H205>mourners;<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H398>eat<s%> thereof shall be <S%H2930>polluted:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> their <S%H3899>bread<s%> for their <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> come <S%H935>into<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
What <S%H4100><s%> will ye <S%H6213>do<s%> in the <S%H4150>solemn<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> and in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H2282>feast<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD?<s%>

For, <S%H3588><s%> <S%H2009>lo,<s%> they are <S%H1980>gone<s%> because of <S%H4480>destruction:<s%> <S%H7701><s%> <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> shall gather them <S%H6908>up,<s%> <S%H4644>Memphis<s%> shall <S%H6912>bury<s%> them: the <S%H4261>pleasant<s%> places for their <S%H3701>silver,<s%> <S%H7057>nettles<s%> shall <S%H3423>possess<s%> them: <S%H2336>thorns<s%> shall be in their <S%H168>tabernacles.<s%>

The <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H6486>visitation<s%> are <S%H935>come,<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H7966>recompense<s%> are <S%H935>come;<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall <S%H3045>know<s%> it: the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> is a <S%H191>fool,<s%> the <S%H7307>spiritual<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> is <S%H7696>mad,<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of thine <S%H5771>iniquity,<s%> and the <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H4895>hatred.<s%>

The <S%H6822>watchman<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> was <S%H5973>with<s%> my <S%H430>God:<s%> but the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> is a <S%H6341>snare<s%> of a <S%H3352>fowler<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H1870>ways,<s%> and <S%H4895>hatred<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of his <S%H430>God.<s%>

They have <S%H6009>deeply<s%> <S%H7843>corrupted<s%> themselves, as in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H1390>Gibeah:<s%> therefore he will <S%H2142>remember<s%> their <S%H5771>iniquity,<s%> he will <S%H6485>visit<s%> their <S%H2403>sins.<s%>

I <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> like <S%H6025>grapes<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness;<s%> I <S%H7200>saw<s%> your <S%H1>fathers<s%> as the <S%H1063>firstripe<s%> in the fig <S%H8384>tree<s%> at her first <S%H7225>time:<s%> but <S%H1992>they<s%> <S%H935>went<s%> to <S%H1187>Baal-peor,<s%> and separated <S%H5144>themselves<s%> unto that <S%H1322>shame;<s%> and their <S%H8251>abominations<s%> <S%H1961>were<s%> according as they <S%H157>loved.<s%>

As for <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> their <S%H3519>glory<s%> shall fly <S%H5774>away<s%> like a <S%H5775>bird,<s%> from the <S%H4480>birth,<s%> <S%H3205><s%> and from the <S%H4480>womb,<s%> <S%H990><s%> and from the <S%H4480>conception.<s%> <S%H2032><s%>

Though <S%H3588><s%> <S%H518><s%> they bring <S%H1431>up<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H1121>children,<s%> yet will I <S%H7921>bereave<s%> them, that there shall not be a <S%H4480>man<s%> <S%H120><s%> left: <S%H3588>yea,<s%> <S%H188>woe<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> to them when I <S%H5493>depart<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> them!

Ephraim, <S%H669><s%> <S%H834>as<s%> I <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H6865>Tyrus,<s%> is <S%H8362>planted<s%> in a pleasant <S%H5116>place:<s%> but <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> shall bring <S%H3318>forth<s%> his <S%H1121>children<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H2026>murderer.<s%>

Give <S%H5414><s%> them, O <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> wilt thou <S%H5414>give?<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> them a <S%H7921>miscarrying<s%> <S%H7358>womb<s%> and <S%H6784>dry<s%> <S%H7699>breasts.<s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> their <S%H7451>wickedness<s%> is in <S%H1537>Gilgal:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> I <S%H8130>hated<s%> them: <S%H5921>for<s%> the <S%H7455>wickedness<s%> of their <S%H4611>doings<s%> I will drive them <S%H1644>out<s%> of mine <S%H4480>house,<s%> <S%H1004><s%> I will <S%H157>love<s%> them <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3254>more:<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H8269>princes<s%> are <S%H5637>revolters.<s%>

Ephraim <S%H669><s%> is <S%H5221>smitten,<s%> their <S%H8328>root<s%> is dried <S%H3001>up,<s%> they shall <S%H6213>bear<s%> <S%H1077>no<s%> <S%H6529>fruit:<s%> <S%H1571>yea,<s%> <S%H3588>though<s%> they bring <S%H3205>forth,<s%> yet will I <S%H4191>slay<s%> even the <S%H4261>beloved<s%> fruit of their <S%H990>womb.<s%>

My <S%H430>God<s%> will cast them <S%H3988>away,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> they did <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H8085>hearken<s%> unto him: and they shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H5074>wanderers<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations.<s%>
